item.caster_curios_bonus.eureka.desc: Gain cooldown reduction based on your extra spell power across all schools.
item.caster_curios_bonus.giant_killer.de: Deal more spell damage to creatures larger than yourself.
item.caster_curios_bonus.mana_overflow.d: Consume more mana, but your spells deal and heal for more.
Gain extra maximum health based on your maximum mana.
item.caster_curios_bonus.all_by_movement: Blink-type spells have their cooldowns halved.
item.caster_curios_bonus.night_hunter.de: Gain true invisibility and speed after killing an enemy.
Your spell lifesteal also heals nearby allies.
item.caster_curios_bonus.venomous_assaul: Your non-Nature spells detonate Poison on the target, dealing its remaining damage instantly.
item.caster_curios_bonus.calamity_resona: Periodically, one of your spell damage will deal a percentage of its original damage to enemies near the target.
item.caster_curios_bonus.voidsnare.desc: When you kill a distant target with a spell, its drops will be instantly teleported to your side.
item.caster_curios_bonus.zephyr_boon.des: Your spells provide a flight boost effect similar to a firework rocket.
item.caster_curios_bonus.reckless_uttera: Allow you to cast Arcane Overdrive
message.caster_curios_bonus.reckless_utt: You are overwhelmed and cannot cast spells! (%s s left)
You are overwhelmed and cannot cast spells!
spell.caster_curios_bonus.arcane_overdri: For a short duration, your spells cost no mana and have no cooldowns, but they generate Overload. Once your Overload is full, you will be silenced.
